snippet.title: Randomice Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2835650/Randomice/

A procedural Metroid-like with no combat, focused on exploration and route planning. Visit hand-crafted rooms, each time with different abilities. Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, the main goal being to determine where you can go next with you current equipment.
